keyword: how many calories is in miso soup
title: How Many Calories Are in Miso Soup?
meta_description: Learn how many calories is in miso soup per cup, including carbs, protein, sodium, and variations for your diet.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Miso Soup?
assumptions: Standard serving (240 ml) of traditional miso soup with miso paste, dashi broth, tofu, wakame seaweed, and green onions; no added oil.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by miso type, brand, added ingredients, and portion size. Check labels or recipes for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One cup of miso soup contains about 77 calories, with 6 g protein and high sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add extra firm tofu (1 oz per cup)
Include udon noodles (50 g per cup)

faqs.q: How many calories is in one cup of miso soup?
faqs.a: Approximately 77 calories for a standard serving.

faqs.q: Is miso soup high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1630 mg per cup due to miso paste; opt for low-sodium versions.

faqs.q: What are the macros in miso soup?
faqs.a: Per cup: 6 g carbs, 6 g protein, 3 g fat, with 1 g fiber.
Very low, around 5 mg per cup from any added ingredients.

faqs.q: How to reduce calories in miso soup?
faqs.a: Skip tofu or noodles, use vegetable broth instead of dashi, or dilute with more water.
